description.description: Auxiliary text, the color is a little lighter than the title, and the font size is also a little smaller, optional
description.description_zh: 辅助性文字，颜色比title浅一点，字号也小一点，可选

close-able.description: Close button (default is the cross icon icon)
close-able.description_zh: 关闭按钮(默认为叉号icon图标)

close-text.description: Replace the close icon with text, which works when close-able is true
close-text.description_zh: 用文字替代关闭图标，close-able为true时有效

show-icon.description: Whether to display the secondary icon on the left
show-icon.description_zh: 是否显示左边的辅助图标

icon.description: The icon names on the left, such as setting the type and show-icon values, will have a default icon
icon.description_zh: 左侧的图标名称，如设置type和show-icon值，会有一个默认的图标

icon-style.description: Customize the style of the icon, object form
icon-style.description_zh: 自定义图标的样式，对象形式

title-style.description: Customize the style of the title, object form
title-style.description_zh: 自定义标题的样式，对象形式

desc-style.description: Customize the style of the content, the form of the object
desc-style.description_zh: 自定义内容的样式，对象形式

events.name: close
events.description: If it is triggered when you click the close button, you need to set show to false in this callback
events.description_zh: 点击关闭按钮时触发，需在此回调设置show为false

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a component is clicked
